fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Flame Breath**: Choose 4 players, Attacking 2 and Roleblocking 2 of them at random, Can only be used on night 3, 6, 9 and so on.
- **Ability 2**: Roleblock a player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- A random player visiting you each even night will be Redirected to a random Good faction member if they aren't from your Faction.
- You learn the role and blackmail players you roleblock twice.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose Lord Bowser.
